actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Resolution disapproving the recommendations of the President with respect to the rates of pay of Federal officials transmitted to the Congress in the appendix to the budget for the fiscal year 1975, and for other purposes.

summary.text: States that the House of Representatives disapproves the recommendations of the President with respect to the rates of pay of Federal officials transmitted to the Congress in the Appendix to the Budget for the fiscal year 1975.

titles.title: Resolution disapproving the recommendations of the President with respect to the rates of pay of Federal officials transmitted to the Congress in the appendix to the budget for the fiscal year 1975, and for other purposes.
